panels.visual: Interior of Wizard Council headquarters - a grand chamber of magical architecture. Ryan the wizard addresses the party, concern evident on his face. Magical lights float overhead.
panels.dialogue: Ryan: "Godrick was never authorized to retrieve the staff. You were deceived."

panels.visual: Ryan hands Armando tickets to a luxury cruise and a pouch of gold. His expression suggests this is a simple task. Armando grins at the payment.
panels.dialogue: Ryan: "Pursue Godrick. Get the staff back. Here are tickets and coin for supplies. Simple enough?"

panels.visual: Eurostras in a sword shop, examining an ugly blade with a pattern like an old couch. The shopkeeper looks bemused. This is 'Grandma's Comfort.'
panels.dialogue: Eurostras: "This one. I'll call it... Grandma's Comfort."

panels.visual: Corpium and Armando eyeing a legendary sword behind glass - 10,000 gold pieces. Their expressions shift from admiration to scheming. This will not end well.
panels.dialogue:
Corpium: "That sword though..."
Armando: "Are you thinking what I'm thinking?"
